about_the_game:
You are a fish. You play volleyball. Taxes, homework, the corporate grind: all curios beyond your wildest imagination.

Up to 10 aquatic friends can flop around the volleyball court in this local multiplayer physics-driven arcade sports throwback.

Physics-driven local multiplayer volleyball


Ah, the multiplayer of yore. Remember sitting on the couch with friends laughing at a silly game for hours on end?

Face off one-on-one to prove your Fish Volleyball superiority or embrace the chaos in five-on-five pandemonium.

Precise timing, positioning, and control of your fish is paramount to victory. Think QWOP meets Slime Volleyball.

Easy to learn, hard to master


It's only one button and a joystick. How hard could it be?

Master the profoundly-complex mechanics of Fish Volleyball to perform high-flying spikes, blocks, rallies, sets, serves, pancakes (it's a volleyball term; look it up), spins, and aces. Simple in concept, difficult in execution.

Deeply modifiable


With a multitude of game modifiers, create any of the millions of possible custom matches. You wanna play volleyball with a massive football in low gravity while players hop the net to tackle one another? Go for it.

Rich Lore


Fish play volleyball.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubunut 14.04 or newer
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Fish Volleyball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
